segments.text: This whole situation is fraught with potential hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing water is making the floor incredibly slick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Anyone could easily slip and take a nasty fall on that wet surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the boy on the stool, he's just asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, I'm sure it's going to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall and injure himself quite badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the shattered dishes if he takes a tumble from that height!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so nervous just watching them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's unawareness only amplifies the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s almost unbelievable that she remains so calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really wish someone would step in and prevent an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene is just a cascade of imminent problems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a recipe for disaster, truly.
segments.speaker: PAR
